mapper.insert: insert into Gesipan values(seq_gesipan.nextval, #{g_category}, #{g_title}, #{g_content}, #{g_writer}, #{g_count}, default, default, null, default, #{locked})
mapper.select: select count(*) from gesipan where g_status='N' and g_category='Community'
select count(*) from gesipan where g_status='N' and g_category='Selling'
select count(*) from gesipan where g_status='N' and g_category='QNA'
select g.*, m.nickname from gesipan g join member m on (g.g_writer = m.user_id) where g_status='N' and g_category = 'Community' order by g_id desc
select g.*, m.nickname from gesipan g join member m on (g.g_writer = m.user_id) where g_status='N' and g_category = 'Selling' order by g_id desc
select g.*, m.nickname from gesipan g join member m on (g.g_writer = m.user_id) where g_status='N' and g_category = 'QNA' order by g_id desc
